response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which holds immense value for us and I believe it will be equally beneficial for you. Given its significance, I propose to offer it to you for $1,350,000. This price reflects not only the intrinsic value of the product but also provides a reasonable margin for us while ensuring you receive a high-quality asset at an attractive cost. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this transaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 1350000}
